SEARCH
Package cn.nukkit.entity

Interface EntityShearable

All Superinterfaces:
EntityComponent
All Known Implementing Classes:
EntityMooshroom, EntitySheep
public interface EntityShearable extends EntityComponent
实体可剪切

例如羊就可被剪羊毛

若作用于此实体的物品的isShears()为true，则将会调用此方法
Entities that can be sheared. Stores value with CoreMemoryTypes.IS_SHEARED

      default boolean shear()
